commands.name: az fabric capacity check-name-availability
examples: az fabric capacity check-name-availability --location westcentralus --name azsdktest --type Microsoft.Fabric/capacities

commands.name: az fabric capacity create
commands.syntax:
az fabric capacity create --capacity-name
                          --resource-group
                          --sku
                          [--administration]
                          [--location]
                          [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                          [--tags]
examples: az fabric capacity create --resource-group TestRG --capacity-name azsdktest --administration "{members:[azsdktest@microsoft.com,azsdktest2@microsoft.com]}" --sku "{name:F2,tier:Fabric}" --location westcentralus

commands.name: az fabric capacity delete
commands.syntax:
az fabric capacity delete [--capacity-name]
                          [--ids]
                          [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                          [--resource-group]
                          [--subscription]
                          [--yes]
examples: az fabric capacity delete --resource-group TestRG --capacity-name azsdktest

commands.name: az fabric capacity list
commands.summary: List FabricCapacity resources by subscription ID.

commands.name: az fabric capacity list-skus
commands.summary: List eligible SKUs for Microsoft Fabric resource provider.

commands.name: az fabric capacity list-skus-for-capacity
commands.summary: List eligible SKUs for a Microsoft Fabric resource.
examples: az fabric capacity list-skus-for-capacity --resource-group TestRG --capacity-name azsdktest

commands.name: az fabric capacity resume
commands.summary: Resume operation of the specified Fabric capacity instance.
commands.syntax:
az fabric capacity resume [--capacity-name]
                          [--ids]
                          [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                          [--resource-group]
                          [--subscription]
examples: az fabric capacity resume --resource-group TestRG --capacity-name azsdktest

commands.name: az fabric capacity show
examples: az fabric capacity show --resource-group TestRG --capacity-name azsdktest

commands.name: az fabric capacity suspend
commands.summary: Suspend operation of the specified Fabric capacity instance.
commands.syntax:
az fabric capacity suspend [--capacity-name]
                           [--ids]
                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                           [--resource-group]
                           [--subscription]
examples: az fabric capacity suspend --resource-group TestRG --capacity-name azsdktest

commands.name: az fabric capacity update
commands.syntax:
az fabric capacity update [--add]
                          [--administration]
                          [--capacity-name]
                          [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                          [--ids]
                          [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                          [--remove]
                          [--resource-group]
                          [--set]
                          [--sku]
                          [--subscription]
                          [--tags]
examples: az fabric capacity update --resource-group TestRG --capacity-name azsdktest --administration "{members:[azsdktest@microsoft.com,azsdktest2@microsoft.com]}" --sku "{name:F4,tier:Fabric}"

commands.name: az fabric capacity wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
